p.k: When international DJ Cosmo needs a secluded escape, his boss? sun-kissed Spanish villa is the perfect location. Determined to tackle his writer?s block, his focus is entirely on his music - that is, until the unannounced arrival of his boss? seductive niece and her flirtatious friends. Reeling from the heat, Chloe soon becomes an intense distraction - causing more than just Cosmo?s focus to wander...
